section.title: Introduction to Limits
section.para: Mathematical analysis is the branch of mathematics dealing with limits and related theory of differentiation and integration.

section.title: Types of Limits
section.para: There are several types of limits, including one-sided limits, two-sided limits, and infinite limits.
